ud6.9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud6.9:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava rattandhakaratimisayam abbhokase nisinno hoti telappadipesu jhayamanesu.
ud6.9:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula adhipataka tesu telappadipesu apataparipatam anayam apajjanti, byasanam apajjanti, anayabyasanam apajjanti.
ud6.9:2.2: Addasa kho bhagava te sambahule adhipatake tesu telappadipesu apataparipatam anayam apajjante, byasanam apajjante, anayabyasanam apajjante.
ud6.9:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
